name: QuantAgent Trading Signals
description: Multi-agent LLM system for crypto trading signals. Uses 4 specialized AI agents (Indicator, Pattern, Trend, Risk) to analyze market data and generate actionable trade recommendations with entry/exit points and risk management.
features: 4 specialized AI agents working in parallel
Technical indicators: RSI, MACD, Stochastic, Bollinger Bands
Chart pattern recognition (head & shoulders, triangles, etc.)
Works with Solana tokens, memecoins, and major cryptos

usage.quick_start:
import { analyzeToken } from '@gicm/quantagent';

const decision = await analyzeToken('SOL', { timeframe: '4h' });

integrations.name: ICM Motion
integrations.description: Trading signals for bonding curve tokens

author.name: gICM
author.attribution: Based on QuantAgent by Xiong et al. (Stony Brook, CMU, Yale, UBC, Fudan)
